full_summary:
======

### Medium Support Vehicle System (MSVS) Maintenance and Repair Services

#### Solicitation Information

*Solicitation Number: WS3682498574*
*Modification Number: 1*
*Publication Date: 2022-10-05*
*Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-02T14:00:00 (m.i.v.t.)*

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested contractors to submit offers for the provision of periodic maintenance and repair services for the Medium Support Vehicle System (MSVS) Workstar 7400 trucks at the Department of National Defence (DND) base in Shilo, Manitoba. Approximately fifty (50) MSVS vehicles require regular upkeep and maintenance during the initial term and two one-year option periods.

*Contract Period: November 30, 2022 to November 30, 2023*
*Two one-year option periods*

Among other requirements, contracted services will include:

* Provision of repair parts
* Vehicle inspections
* Mechanical, electrical, and body repairs
* Warranty support as necessary

 Contractors are expected to submit their offers electronically through Ariba Discovery. Once the tender has closed, only compliant bids will be considered for the contract award.

*Contact Information:*
*Diop, Nafissa (SPAC/PSPC)*
*Email: [nafissa.diop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nafissa.diop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)*
*Mailing Address: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada*
*Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14284616?extsite=MTQyODQ2MTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==*

Do not miss out on this opportunity. Log on to Ariba Discovery to review the tender and offer submission guidelines. Ensure that your bid is electronic and submitted by the tender closing date to avoid delays and non-compliance. Don't wait; submit your offer today.
